trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Homestead
There were no other sightings in Homestead on or around April 9th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding in a car in south Florida between 95 in Miami and the road to the Florida Keys. I saw a group of lights hovering and went right by it in the car, it was close, I kept staring expecting to see a tower, a microwave, radio tower or something this group of lights was attached to and I kept staring as I was a passenger and it was on my side of the road (we were driving from the Keys toward Miami). I did not see the metal tower that the lights were attached to. I have thought about this for 10 days and decided to write about it. I first noticed because the driver of the vehicle I was in asked me what was that light attached to? 3. I thought it was attached to a radio tower, it was not. 4. The object did not move, it was stable. I quit staring it as we drove right by it. It was close to the road, but suspended maybe 400-600 feet in the air. 5. My feelings were that it was some sort of optical illusion. 6. We drove by it, it was still there and I thought no more about it except wondered why I did not see the tower it was attached to. Did anyone else see this in South Florida? I can talk to the driver and find out more exactly what road we were on. I was a tourist and didn't have a good idea where we really were.
